text.text: 1: This is where your items go that you want smelted. The number of slots will change depending on the size of your smeltery.
2: This is where your molten materials can be seen. You can click on one to select it for pouring, hovering over the blank section will give you details about the capacity of the smeltery.
3：這是顯示燃料的地方。將鼠標懸停在它上面將顯示確切的數量和類型。
